subject: p13031876
Impression: PA and lateral chest compared to : New endotracheal tube is in standard placement. Feeding tube passes into the stomach and out of view as before. Right PIC line ends in the mid-to-low SVC. Bibasilar atelectasis moderate-to-severe on the left, mild on the right, unchanged. Previous mild pulmonary edema has resolved over the past three hours, but there has been an increase in the small-to-moderate left pleural effusion. Heart size is normal. Mediastinal vasculature is not dilated.
